participant_1.background:
I'm afraid that I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was.
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
both of my parents are teachers.
i have an iphone.

participant_2.background:
I woke up one morning and found my entire house had been robbed.
not a day goes by that i don t drink four mountain dews.
I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.
i work in a flower shop.
i grew up in the deep south.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Pretty good! I woke up a little early today and read my favorite comic books before I started blogging.
That sounds like a good way to start the day. I'm a bit jealous because I'm not a morning person. I usually wake up around noon and then go to the beach.
Oh, that sounds nice. I love going to the beach. I grew up in the deep south so I'm used to the heat.
I'm from the north so I'm not used to the heat. But I love the beach because it's so relaxing.
Yeah, it is. I love just sitting on the sand and listening to the waves.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, blog, and spend time with my cats.
Oh, I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love comic books and fantasy novels.
I love comic books too! I'm reading a new series right now called The Walking Dead.
Oh, I've heard of that one. I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good. So what do you do for work?
I work in a flower shop.
That sounds fun. I've always wanted to work in a flower shop.
I bet it is. I love flowers
